summary: This cable discusses WAVE plans to start training ALICE INFILS EAR and contains personal information, including names and dates of birth, of several individuals: DANILO POZO CASTRO, EUSTIQUIANO GARCIA LEZCANO, MIGUEL A. DIAZ ISALCUE, OSCAR OLIVA CANTUD, JUAN ESPINOSA GONZALEZ, and FRANCISCO DOMINGUEZ ELEJALDE. It also requests POAS subjects and a card set and discusses JESUS RIERA FERRO as a candidate for RADOP.
title: WAVE Plans and Training
